topic.title: Child or Young Person's Mental Health Transition Plan
topic.shortdesc: A Child or Young Person's Mental Health Transition Plan is a joint-agency plan to prepare for transition out of a Children and Young People's Mental Health Service (CYPMHS) as a consequence of the PATIENT’s age or change to care needs.
